## vision\_v1.Schema$Product.name property

The resource name of the product.

Format is: `projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID/products/PRODUCT_ID`<!-- -->.

This field is ignored when creating a product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
name?: string | null;
```
